means: 撒旦崇拜者，撒旦崇拜主义者
[亦作 s-]邪恶的人；穷凶极恶的人

means.word_mean: 1. an adherent of Satan or Satanism

auth_sentence.content: For example, Vulture was written from his experience of spending a few days in a hotel room with a Satanist.
